name: List of Sacrifices

pages.text: This entry details the possible costs and rewards for the different $(l:beneath/ancient_altar)Sacrifices$() one can make in Beneath.
$(li)Raw Slime$() -> Rich Garnierite$()$(li)Cursed Hide -> Large Raw Hide$()$(li)Cobblestone -> Blackstone$()
